level.text: A person knows a fact when the person:
Has actual knowledge of it; or
Is deemed to know it under subsection (d)(1) of this section or law other than this chapter.
A person has notice of a fact when the person:
Has reason to know the fact from all of the facts known to the person at the time in question; or
Is deemed to have notice of the fact under subsection (d)(2) of this section;
A person notifies another of a fact by taking steps reasonably required to inform the other person in ordinary course, whether or not the other person knows the fact.
A person that is not a member shall be deemed to:
Know of a limitation on authority to transfer real property as provided in § 29-803.02(g); and
Have notice of a limited liability company's:
Dissolution, 90 days after a statement of dissolution under § 29- 807.02(b)(2)(A) becomes effective;
Termination, 90 days after a statement of termination § 29-807.02(b)(2)(F) becomes effective; and

Participation in a merger, interest exchange, conversion, or domestication, 90 days after the articles of merger, interest exchange, conversion, or domestication under subchapter IX of this chapter or under Chapter 2 of this title becomes effective.
